description.value:
Variant of the Adamantine Mantle. Negates two points of Armour Penetration of any incoming attack. Wearer gains +10 to Opposed Weapon Skill Tests to Feint. When taking the Defensive Stance Action, foes suffer an additional -10 on Weapon Skill Tests to attach the wearer. Wearer cannot be set on fire, and never needs to make Agility Tests to avoid being set on fire.

Requirements

Salamander's Chapter Only.

Effect: Respected

Notes: 20 R
